archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.7.3g: g) any remaining technical security vulnerabilities do not exceed approved thresholds for security vulnerability rating systems (e.g. Microsoft Bug Bars, Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) or OWASP Risk Rating Methodology)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
